Vivin Thiyagarajan
SUMMARY
EXPERIENCE
USC Viterbi School of Engineering
January 2025 - Present
 
Indian Institute of Science (IISc)
April 2024 - July 2024
 
Indian Institute of Technology, Madras
September 2022 - 
September 2023
 
Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee
September 2021 - 
September 2022
 
Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology, Delhi
October 2021 - January 
2022
 
Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University
May 2021 - July 2021
 
I build intelligent systems that help robots see, learn, and (hopefully) not crash. From training 
reinforcement learning agents to optimizing robotic manipulation with vision-language models, I thrive at 
the intersection of AI and robotics. Whether it痴 tinkering with ROS, fine-tuning neural networks, or 
designing autonomous systems, I love pushing the limits of what machines can do用referably without 
too many unexpected "features." Always up for a challenge, a great dataset, and a robot that actually 
follows instructions.
 
 
 
 
 
 
vthiyaga@usc.edu
https://www.linkedin.com/in/vivin-thiyagarajan-94866a1ab

Summer Undergraduate Research Internship (SURI)
